text: Anata gata no te o hikae nasai. Soshite reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai.' To tsuge rareta mono o, anata wa minakatta no ka. Iza kare-ra ni sento ga meiji rareru to, miyo. Kare-ra no naka no ippa wa, chodo arra o osoreru yo ni, ningen o osore hajimeru. Iya motto hidoku osoreru. Soshite iu. `Omo yo. Anata wa, naze watashi-tachi ni sento o meiji raremasu ka. Naze shibarakunoaida, watashi-tachi o yuyo nasaimasen ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Gense no kanraku wa sasaina monodearu. Raise koso wa,(arra o) osoreru mono ni totte wa mottomo sugurete iru. Anata gata wa, sukoshi mo futo ni atsukawa renai nodearu
